page.title: 05St.Mary's Church-The Rector
page.content: Services:I have 3 or 4 services on Sunday and 1 at least on other days except Monday and Saturday. Costs: St. Mary's in Richmond needs about Â£20,000 a year.About a third of this goes to people who work for the church,a tenth we give to people in need like Ethiopia and the rest pays for the oil,electricity,cleaning and other things for the church building. Furniture:The choir stalls were brought from Easby Abbey about 350 years ago.All the furniture in the Green Howards Chapel, the organ casing and the pulpit were made by Mousie Thompson of Kilburn. Repairs:St.Mary's needs about Â£370,000 for repairs especially on the roof. {My}Job:I like it because it is {always }different;meeting different people,never the same two days running there is always more work to be done.
